bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of chuang 瘡 , sores, conditions inflicted on the skin or flesh by being struck with a cudgel, including fresh injuries that have not yet become infected, as well as open inflamed sores resulting from injuries some time ago. Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 25: 治 杖瘡方：鍛石（七斤），新豬血（一升）。右二味，和丸，熟燒之破， 更丸，燒三遍止，為末敷上 , “Recipe to cure cudgel wounds : duan shi (7 jin ), fresh hog blood (1 sheng ). These two ingredients are to be formed to pills. Burn them until they break open. Form pills again. Burn three times and then stop. Prepare a powder and apply it to [the wound]”.
